fwatlasbc 0.0.0.9004
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Get Rkm

fwa_rkm.Rd

Provided a blue_line_key and start and possibly end distance upstream from river mouth, return river kilometre points at regular intervals.

fwa_rkm(
  blue_line_key,
  interval = 1000,
  start = 0,
  end = NULL,
  epsg = getOption("fwa.epsg", 3005),
  limit = getOption("fwa.limit", 10000)
)

Arguments

blue_line_key

An integer of the stream blue line key.
interval

An integer of the interval distance in meters.
start

An integer of the distance in meters upstream from the river mouth to start from.
end

An integer of the distance in meters upstream from the river mouth to start from.
epsg

A positive whole number of the epsg to transform features to.
limit

A positive whole number of the maximum number of features to return.

Value

A sf object

See also

Other rkm: fwa_nearest_rkm()

Examples

fwa_rkm(356308001)
#> Warning: `fwa_rkm()` was deprecated in fwatlasbc 0.0.0.9004.
#> Please use `fwa_rm()` instead.
#> Simple feature collection with 20 features and 2 fields
#> Geometry type: POINT
